overview: A beautiful bride commits suicide in the waters of the Turvo River after having her honor stained with blood. Over the next few years, the small farmers of Linha Baixo Lajeado Azul, in the interior of Rio Grande do Sul, began to encounter fantastic appearances of a Bride in search of lost love. In A Noiva do Turvo, Canibal Filmes portrays the beauty and mystery of this unknown legend that stirs the popular imagination of the simple people who live on the banks of the dark Turvo River, stage of dense romances.
title: A Noiva do Turvo
